Classes.name: character_consumed_item
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a character consumes an item from their inventory.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: ID of the catalog item from which the consumed inventory item was created. This can be used to look up the item from the catalog.

properties.name: ItemInstanceId
properties.description: The specific ID of the item that was consumed.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Version of the catalog from which the consumed inventory item was created.

properties.name: PreviousUsesRemaining
properties.description: For multiple use items, the number of uses that remained before the item was consumed.

properties.name: UsesRemaining
properties.description: For multiple use items, the number of uses remaining after the item was consumed.

Classes.name: character_created
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a character is created for the first time.

properties.name: Created
properties.description: When the character was created.

Classes.name: character_inventory_item_added
Classes.description: This event is triggered when an item is granted to a character.

properties.name: InstanceId
properties.description: Unique instance ID of the inventory item that was added.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: Catalog item ID of the inventory item that was added.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: Display name of the item that was added.

properties.name: Class
properties.description: Class of the item that was added.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Catalog version in which the item that was added is defined.

properties.name: Expiration
properties.description: When the item expires. The value is null if the item does not expire.

properties.name: RemainingUses
properties.description: How many uses the item has, if it has a limited number of uses.

properties.name: Annotation
properties.description: Optional details about the inventory item.

properties.name: CouponCode
properties.description: Redeemed coupon (if any) that granted the item.

properties.name: BundleContents
properties.description: Catalog item IDs of any other items granted to the character along with this one as part of a bundle.

Classes.name: character_statistic_changed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a character statistic is changed.

properties.name: StatisticName
properties.description: Name of the statistic that changed.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: Version of the statistic that changed. This is relevant for statistics that reset, since each time the statistic resets the version increments.

properties.name: StatisticValue
properties.description: New value of the statistic, after the change.

properties.name: StatisticPreviousValue
properties.description: Old value of the statistic, before the change.

Classes.name: character_vc_item_purchased
Classes.description: This event is triggered when the character makes a purchase using virtual currency.

properties.name: PurchaseId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the purchase transaction.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: Identifier of the catalog item that was purchased.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Version of the catalog from which the item was purchased.

properties.name: CurrencyCode
properties.description: Currency that was used to purchase the item.

properties.name: Quantity
properties.description: Quantity of items that were purchased.

properties.name: UnitPrice
properties.description: Price paid per item, expressed in the virtual currency.

Classes.name: character_virtual_currency_balance_changed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a character's virtual currency balance changes.

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyName
properties.description: Virtual currency whose balance changed.

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyBalance
properties.description: New virtual currency balance after the change.

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyPreviousBalance
properties.description: Old virtual currency balance before the change.

properties.name: OrderId
properties.description: Id of the order that triggered the balance changes

Classes.name: display_name_filtered
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a display name is filtered by community sift.

properties.name: PlayerId
properties.description: If event occurs at account creation, then no player exists yet. Otherwise, the player whose displayname update was filtered

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: Value of the display name that was filtered

Classes.name: player_ad_campaign_attribution
Classes.description: This event is triggered by an attribution tracking Add-on when a player is matched to a paid acquisition campaign.

properties.name: CampaignId
properties.description: The ID of the campaign, as passed in by the attribution provider.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_added_title
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player creates a new account for a title. Note: this event is triggered once per title rather than once per publisher.

properties.name: Platform
properties.description: Authentication method used to register player's account.

properties.name: PlatformUserId
properties.description: Unique ID for the player's account associated with the Origination authentication method.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: Player's display name when they added this title.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_banned
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player is banned.

properties.name: BanExpiration
properties.description: When the ban expires. The value is null if the ban is permanent.

properties.name: PermanentBan
properties.description: Whether this ban is permanent.

properties.name: BanId
properties.description: ID of the ban. Useful for tracking unique bans, if the player has been banned before.

properties.name: BanReason
properties.description: The reason why the player was banned.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_completed_password_reset
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player completes the password reset process by visiting the link URL that was sent to them and choosing a new password.

properties.name: RecoveryEmailAddress
properties.description: Email address to which the password reset link was sent.

properties.name: PasswordResetId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the password reset link. This cannot be used to complete the reset.

properties.name: InitiatedFromIPAddress
properties.description: IP address from which the password reset process was initiated.

properties.name: InitiationTimestamp
properties.description: When the password reset process was initiated.

properties.name: InitiatedBy
properties.description: Source that initiated the password reset process.

properties.name: LinkExpiration
properties.description: Expiration time for the password reset link.

properties.name: CompletedFromIPAddress
properties.description: IP address from which the password reset process was completed.

properties.name: CompletionTimestamp
properties.description: When the password reset process was completed.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_consumed_item
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player consumes an item from their inventory.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: ID of the catalog item from which the consumed inventory item was created. This can be used to look up the item from the catalog.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Version of the catalog from which the consumed inventory item was created.

properties.name: ItemInstanceId
properties.description: The specific ID of the item that was consumed.

properties.name: PreviousUsesRemaining
properties.description: For multiple use items, the number of uses that remained before the item was consumed.

properties.name: UsesRemaining
properties.description: For multiple use items, the number of uses remaining after the item was consumed.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_created
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player account is created for the first time. Note: this event is only triggered once per publisher, not once per title.

properties.name: Created
properties.description: When the player account was created.

properties.name: PublisherId
properties.description: Unique ID for the publisher account under which this player account is created.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_displayname_changed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player's display name is changed.

properties.name: PreviousDisplayName
properties.description: Previous display name before the change.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: New display name after the change.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_executed_cloudscript
Classes.description: This event is optionally triggered when a CloudScript function is executed, either by calling the ExecuteCloudScript API with the GeneratePlayStreamEvent option or triggered by a PlayStream event action with the 'Publish results as a PlayStream Event' box checked.

properties.name: FunctionName
properties.description: Name of the CloudScript function that was called.

properties.name: CloudScriptExecutionResult
properties.description: Result of the CloudScript function, including diagnostic information that is useful for debugging.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_inventory_item_added
Classes.description: This event is triggered when an item is granted to a player.

properties.name: InstanceId
properties.description: Unique instance ID of the inventory item that was added.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: Catalog item ID of the inventory item that was added.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: Display name of the item that was added.

properties.name: Class
properties.description: Class of the item that was added.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Catalog version in which the item that was added is defined.

properties.name: Expiration
properties.description: When the item expires. The value is null if the item does not expire.

properties.name: RemainingUses
properties.description: How many uses the item has, if it has a limited number of uses.

properties.name: Annotation
properties.description: Optional details about the inventory item.

properties.name: CouponCode
properties.description: Redeemed coupon (if any) that granted the item.

properties.name: BundleContents
properties.description: Catalog item IDs of any other items granted to the player along with this one as part of a bundle.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_joined_lobby
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player joins a multiplayer game session.

properties.name: LobbyId
properties.description: Unique ID of the game session the player joined.

properties.name: GameMode
properties.description: Game mode of the game session the player joined.

properties.name: Region
properties.description: Region in which the game server lives that the player joined.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_left_lobby
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player leaves a multiplayer game session.

properties.name: LobbyId
properties.description: Unique ID of the game session the player joined.

properties.name: GameMode
properties.description: Game mode of the game session the player joined.

properties.name: Region
properties.description: Region in which the game server lives that the player joined.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_linked_account
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a new authentication method is linked to a player's account.

properties.name: Origination
properties.description: Authentication method being linked to a player's account.

properties.name: OriginationUserId
properties.description: Player's identity under authentication method being linked to player's account.

properties.name: Username
properties.description: Player's username linked with the given provider

properties.name: Email
properties.description: Player's email linked with the given provider

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_logged_in
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player logs in.

properties.name: Platform
properties.description: Authentication method used to login the player.

properties.name: PlatformUserId
properties.description: Player's identity under the authentication method used to login the player.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_matched_with_lobby
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player is matched with a game session (but has not yet actually joined the game session).

properties.name: LobbyId
properties.description: Unique ID of the game session the player joined.

properties.name: GameMode
properties.description: Game mode of the game session the player joined.

properties.name: Region
properties.description: Region in which the game server lives that the player joined.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_password_reset_link_sent
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player is sent a link to reset their password.

properties.name: RecoveryEmailAddress
properties.description: Email address to which the password reset link was sent.

properties.name: InitiatedFromIPAddress
properties.description: IP address from which the password reset process was initiated.

properties.name: InitiatedBy
properties.description: Source that initiated the password reset process.

properties.name: PasswordResetId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the password reset link. This cannot be used to complete the reset.

properties.name: LinkExpiration
properties.description: Expiration time for the password reset link.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_realmoney_purchase
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player makes a real money purchase, and generates revenue for the game.

properties.name: PaymentProvider
properties.description: Payment provider used to make the purchase.

properties.name: PaymentType
properties.description: Type of payment used to make the purchase.

properties.name: OrderTotal
properties.description: Total value of the purchase in the system currency (defaults to USD).

properties.name: TransactionTotal
properties.description: Total value of the purchase in the local currency used to make the purchase, if applicable.

properties.name: TransactionCurrency
properties.description: Local currency used to make the purchase, if applicable.

properties.name: OrderId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the order.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_redeemed_coupon
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player makes a real money purchase, and generates revenue for the game.

properties.name: CouponCode
properties.description: Coupon code the player redeemed.

properties.name: GrantedInventoryItems
properties.description: Items added to the player's inventory by redeeming the coupon.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_registered_push_notifications
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player registers for push notifications.

properties.name: Platform
properties.description: Platform on which the player is registering for push notifications.

properties.name: DeviceToken
properties.description: Unique device token registered for push notifications.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_reported_as_abusive
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player is reported by another player as abusive.

properties.name: ReportedByPlayer
properties.description: Player ID of the player who made the report.

properties.name: Comment
properties.description: Comment submitted by the player who made the report.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_statistic_changed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player statistic is changed.

properties.name: StatisticName
properties.description: Name of the statistic that changed.

properties.name: StatisticId
properties.description: Unique ID of the statistic that changed.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: Version of the statistic that changed. This is relevant for statistics that reset, since each time the statistic resets the version increments.

properties.name: StatisticValue
properties.description: New value of the statistic, after the change.

properties.name: StatisticPreviousValue
properties.description: Old value of the statistic, before the change.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_statistic_deleted
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player statistic is deleted.

properties.name: StatisticName
properties.description: Name of the statistic that was deleted.

properties.name: StatisticId
properties.description: Unique ID of the statistic that was deleted.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: Version of the statistic. This is relevant for statistics that reset, since each time the statistic resets the version increments.

properties.name: StatisticPreviousValue
properties.description: Old value of the statistic, before being deleted.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_tag_added
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a tag is added to a player profile.

properties.name: TagName
properties.description: Name of the tag that is added.

properties.name: Namespace
properties.description: Namespace for this tag

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_tag_removed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a tag is removed from a player profile.

properties.name: TagName
properties.description: Name of the tag that is removed.

properties.name: Namespace
properties.description: Namespace for this tag

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_triggered_action_executed_cloudscript
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a CloudScript function is run as the result of a PlayStream action, and the 'Publish results as a PlayStream Event' box was checked.

properties.name: FunctionName
properties.description: Name of the CloudScript function that was called.

properties.name: CloudScriptExecutionResult
properties.description: Result of the CloudScript function, including an error information. Useful for debugging.

properties.name: TriggeringEventData
properties.description: The full JSON data of the event that triggered this CloudScript function to run. Useful for debugging.

properties.name: TriggeringEventName
properties.description: Name of the event that triggered this CloudScript function to run.

properties.name: TriggeringPlayer
properties.description: JSON data profile of the player that triggered this CloudScript function to run.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_unlinked_account
Classes.description: This event is triggered when an authentication method is unlinked from a player's account.

properties.name: Origination
properties.description: Authentication method being unlinked from a player's account.

properties.name: OriginationUserId
properties.description: Player's identity under authentication method being unlinked from player's account.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_vc_item_purchased
Classes.description: This event is triggered when the player makes a purchase using virtual currency.

properties.name: PurchaseId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the purchase transaction.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: Identifier of the catalog item that was purchased.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Version of the catalog from which the item was purchased.

properties.name: CurrencyCode
properties.description: Currency that was used to purchase the item.

properties.name: Quantity
properties.description: Quantity of items that were purchased.

properties.name: UnitPrice
properties.description: Price paid per item, expressed in the virtual currency.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: player_virtual_currency_balance_changed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a player's virtual currency balance changes.

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyName
properties.description: Virtual currency whose balance changed.

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyBalance
properties.description: New virtual currency balance after the change.

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyPreviousBalance
properties.description: Old virtual currency balance before the change.

properties.name: OrderId
properties.description: Id of the order that triggered the balance changes

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title to which this player event applies.

Classes.name: session_ended
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a session ends

properties.name: EndTime
properties.description: The time the session was explicitly ended at, clamped to 24 hours. This can differ significantly from the event timestamp if the game crashed

properties.name: UserId
properties.description: The ID of the user associated with this session

properties.name: KilobytesWritten
properties.description: The total kilobytes written to the S3 file associated with this session

properties.name: SessionLengthMs
properties.description: The length of the session in milliseconds

properties.name: Crashed
properties.description: Whether or not the session was marked as a crash

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title associated with this session

Classes.name: session_started
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a session starts.

properties.name: TemporaryWriteUrl
properties.description: The pre-signed S3 URL associated with the session, which has PUT permissions.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The ID of the title associated with this session

Classes.name: title_added_cloudscript
Classes.description: This event is triggered when new CloudScript is uploaded to PlayFab.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: Version number of the CloudScript file that was added.

properties.name: Revision
properties.description: Revision number of the CloudScript file that was added.

properties.name: Published
properties.description: Whether the CloudScript that was uploaded is live.

properties.name: ScriptNames
properties.description: Names of the individual script files modified. Currently this is just 'CloudScript.js' but later we will support multiple files.

Classes.name: title_game_build_added
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a new game build is uploaded for a game title.

properties.name: BuildId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the build that was uploaded.

properties.name: Regions
properties.description: This build is being deployed in these regions and will shortly be available for players to join.

properties.name: MinFreeGameSlots
properties.description: The minimum number of free slots to maintain across all servers for this build.

properties.name: MaxGamesPerHost
properties.description: The maximum number of game sessions that can be run on a single server.

Classes.name: title_catalog_updated
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a catalog is changed.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Version of the catalog that was updated.

properties.name: Deleted
properties.description: Was the catalog deleted.

Classes.name: title_client_rate_limited_alert
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a single IP address generates too many API calls to PlayFab and is throttled.

properties.name: GraphUrl
properties.description: URL of an image graph of the counter that triggered the alert.

properties.name: AlertEventId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the alert that triggered this event.

properties.name: API
properties.description: The PlayFab API that was called too frequently.

properties.name: ErrorCode
properties.description: Error message that was returned to the client.

properties.name: Level
properties.description: Level of the alert. Values include Warn, Alert, Critical.

properties.name: AlertState
properties.description: State of the alert. Values include Triggered, Recovered, ReTriggered.

Classes.name: title_exceeded_limit
Classes.description: This event is triggererd when a title exceeds a service limit and receives an error.

properties.name: LimitId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the limit that was exceeded.

properties.name: LimitDisplayName
properties.description: The display name of the limit that was exceeded.

properties.name: Unit
properties.description: The unit of the limit that was exceeded.

properties.name: LimitValue
properties.description: The limit value that was exceeded.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value that exceeded the limit.

properties.name: Details
properties.description: Additional details about the exceeded limit

Classes.name: title_high_error_rate_alert
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a game title experiences a high rate of errors.

properties.name: GraphUrl
properties.description: URL of an image graph of the counter that triggered the alert.

properties.name: AlertEventId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the alert that triggered this event.

properties.name: API
properties.description: The PlayFab API that is generating the high rate of errors.

properties.name: ErrorCode
properties.description: Error message that was returned to the client.

properties.name: Level
properties.description: Level of the alert. Values include Warn, Alert, Critical.

properties.name: AlertState
properties.description: State of the alert. Values include Triggered, Recovered, ReTriggered.

Classes.name: title_initiated_player_password_reset
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a title initiates the account recovery process for a player.

properties.name: PlayerId
properties.description: Player's account ID.

properties.name: PlayerRecoveryEmailAddress
properties.description: Email address to which the account recovery email was sent.

properties.name: PasswordResetId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the password reset link. This cannot be used to complete the reset.

Classes.name: title_limit_changed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a title changes a service limit.

properties.name: LimitId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the limit that changed.

properties.name: LimitDisplayName
properties.description: The display name of the limit that changed.

properties.name: Unit
properties.description: The unit of the limit that changed.

properties.name: TransactionId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the limit change transaction.

properties.name: PreviousPriceUSD
properties.description: The price of the limit level in US Dollars before the change, if any.

properties.name: PreviousValue
properties.description: The limit value before the change, if any.

properties.name: PriceUSD
properties.description: The price of the limit level in US Dollars, if any.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The limit value after the change, if any.

Classes.name: title_game_build_modified
Classes.description: This event is triggered when any of the game build settings are modified.

properties.name: BuildId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the build that was modified.

properties.name: Regions
properties.description: List of regions where the build has been deployed.

properties.name: MinFreeGameSlots
properties.description: The minimum number of free slots to maintain across all servers for this build.

properties.name: MaxGamesPerHost
properties.description: The maximum number of game sessions that can be run on a single server.

Classes.name: title_news_updated
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a title news is created or updated.

properties.name: NewsId
properties.description: Id of the news that is new or updated.

properties.name: NewsTitle
properties.description: The current title of the news that is new or updated.

properties.name: DateCreated
properties.description: When the title news was initially created.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The current status of the news that is new or updated.

Classes.name: title_published_cloudscript
Classes.description: An inactive revision of CloudScript has been made into the active 'live' version.

properties.name: Revision
properties.description: Revision number of the CloudScript that was activated.

Classes.name: title_requested_limit_change
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a title requests a service limit change.

properties.name: LimitId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the limit requested to change.

properties.name: LimitDisplayName
properties.description: The display name of the limit requested to change.

properties.name: Unit
properties.description: The unit of the limit requested to change.

properties.name: TransactionId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the requested limit change transaction.

properties.name: PreviousLevelName
properties.description: The name of the limit level at the time of the requested change, if any.

properties.name: PreviousPriceUSD
properties.description: The price of the limit level in US Dollars at the time of the requested change, if any.

properties.name: PreviousValue
properties.description: The limit value at the time of the requested change, if any.

properties.name: LevelName
properties.description: The name of the requested limit level.

properties.name: PriceUSD
properties.description: The price of the requested limit level in US Dollars, if any.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The limit value of the requested change, if any.

Classes.name: title_scheduled_cloudscript_executed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a CloudScript function is run at a pre-scheduled time.

properties.name: FunctionName
properties.description: Name of the CloudScript function that was called.

properties.name: CloudScriptExecutionResult
properties.description: Result of the CloudScript function, including an error information. Useful for debugging.

Classes.name: title_statistic_version_changed
Classes.description: This event is triggered when the version of a statistic changes, causing its leaderboard to reset.

properties.name: StatisticName
properties.description: Unique name of the statistic.

properties.name: StatisticVersion
properties.description: Version of the statistic, following the update.

properties.name: ScheduledResetInterval
properties.description: The interval on which the statistic leaderboard was configured to reset, if any.

properties.name: ScheduledResetTime
properties.description: The time at which the statistic leaderboard was configured to reset, if any.

Classes.name: title_store_updated
Classes.description: This event is triggered when a store is changed.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Catalog version that the updated store belongs to.

properties.name: StoreId
properties.description: ID of the updated store.

properties.name: Deleted
properties.description: Was the store deleted.

properties.name: InstanceId
properties.description: Unique instance ID of the inventory item.

properties.name: ItemId
properties.description: Catalog item ID of the inventory item.

properties.name: CatalogVersion
properties.description: Catalog version of the inventory item.

properties.name: Level
properties.description: 'Debug', 'Info', or 'Error'

properties.name: Data
properties.description: Optional object accompanying the message as contextual information

properties.name: Error
properties.description: Error code, such as CloudScriptNotFound, JavascriptException, CloudScriptFunctionArgumentSizeExceeded, CloudScriptAPIRequestCountExceeded, CloudScriptAPIRequestError, or CloudScriptHTTPRequestError

properties.name: Message
properties.description: Details about the error

properties.name: StackTrace
properties.description: Point during the execution of the script at which the error occurred, if any

properties.name: FunctionName
properties.description: The name of the function that executed

properties.name: Revision
properties.description: The revision of the CloudScript that executed

properties.name: FunctionResult
properties.description: The object returned from the CloudScript function, if any

properties.name: Logs
properties.description: Entries logged during the function execution. These include both entries logged in the function code using log.info() and log.error() and error entries for API and HTTP request failures.

properties.name: APIRequestsIssued
properties.description: Number of PlayFab API requests issued by the CloudScript function

properties.name: HttpRequestsIssued
properties.description: Number of external HTTP requests issued by the CloudScript function

properties.name: Error
properties.description: Information about the error, if any, that occured during execution

properties.name: Platform
properties.description: Attribution network name

properties.name: CampaignId
properties.description: Attribution campaign identifier

properties.name: AttributedAt
properties.description: UTC time stamp of attribution

properties.name: Platform
properties.description: Push notification platform

properties.name: NotificationEndpointARN
properties.description: Notification configured endpoint

properties.name: Platform
properties.description: Authentication platform

properties.name: PlatformUserId
properties.description: Platform user identifier

properties.name: Username
properties.description: Linked account's username

properties.name: Email
properties.description: Linked account's email

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Statistic ID

properties.name: StatisticVersion
properties.description: Statistic version (0 if not a versioned statistic)

properties.name: StatisticValue
properties.description: Current statistic value

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Statistic name

properties.name: PlayerId
properties.description: PlayFab Player ID

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: Title ID this profile applies to

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: Player Display Name

properties.name: PublisherId
properties.description: Publisher this player belongs to

properties.name: Origination
properties.description: Player account origination

properties.name: Created
properties.description: Player record created

properties.name: LastLogin
properties.description: Last login

properties.name: BannedUntil
properties.description: Banned until UTC Date. If permanent ban this is set for 20 years after the original ban date.

properties.name: Statistics
properties.description: Dictionary of player's statistics using only the latest version's value

properties.name: ValuesToDate
properties.description: Dictionary of player's total currency purchases. The key VTD is a sum of all player_realmoney_purchase events OrderTotals.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: List of player's tags for segmentation.

properties.name: VirtualCurrencyBalances
properties.description: Dictionary of player's virtual currency balances

properties.name: AdCampaignAttributions
properties.description: Array of ad campaigns player has been attributed to

properties.name: PushNotificationRegistrations
properties.description: Array of configured push notification end points

properties.name: LinkedAccounts
properties.description: Array of third party accounts linked to this player

properties.name: PlayerStatistics
properties.description: Array of player statistics

properties.name: ParentTriggerId
properties.description: The ID of the trigger that caused this event to be created.

properties.name: ParentEventId
properties.description: The ID of the previous event that caused this event to be created by hitting a trigger.

properties.name: TriggeredEvents
properties.description: If true, then this event was allowed to trigger subsequent events in a trigger.
